verses.verse: חַטַּ֣את <WH2403> The sin יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah כְּתוּבָ֛ה <WH3789> [is] written בְּעֵ֥ט <WH5842> with a pen בַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> of iron בְּצִפֹּ֣רֶן <WH6856> [and] with the point שָׁמִ֑יר <WH8068> of a diamond חֲרוּשָׁה֙ <WH2790> [it is] graven עַל־ <WH5921> upon ל֣וּחַ <WH3871> upon the table לִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> of their heart וּלְקַרְנ֖וֹת <WH7161> and upon the horns מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4196> of your altars

כִּזְכֹּ֤ר <WH2142> remember בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> Whilst their children מִזְבְּחוֹתָ֔ם <WH4196> their altars וַאֲשֵׁרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH842> and their groves עַל־ <WH5921> and עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> trees רַֽעֲנָ֑ן <WH7488> by the green עַ֖ל <WH5921> and גְּבָע֥וֹת <WH1389> hills הַגְּבֹהֽוֹת׃ <WH1364> upon the high

הֲרָרִי֙ <WH2042> O my mountain בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field חֵילְךָ֥ <WH2428> thy substance כָל־ <WH3605> and all אוֹצְרוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH214> [and] all thy treasures לָבַ֣ז <WH957> to the spoil אֶתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> I will give בָּמֹתֶ֕יךָ <WH1116> [and] thy high places בְּחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> for sin בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout גְּבוּלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1366> throughout all thy borders

וְשָׁמַטְתָּ֗ה <WH8058> And thou even thyself shalt discontinue וּבְךָ֙ מִנַּחֲלָֽתְךָ֙ <WH5159> from thine heritage אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> that I gave לָ֔ךְ וְהַעֲבַדְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH5647> thee and I will cause thee to serve אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> thine enemies בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָדָ֑עְתָּ <WH3045> which thou knowest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֛שׁ <WH784> a fire קְדַחְתֶּ֥ם <WH6919> not for ye have kindled בְּאַפִּ֖י <WH639> in mine anger עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> ever תּוּקָֽד׃ <WH3344> [which] shall burn ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אָר֤וּר <WH779> Cursed הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יִבְטַ֣ח <WH982> that trusteth בָּֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> in man וְשָׂ֥ם <WH7760> and maketh בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> flesh זְרֹע֑וֹ <WH2220> his arm וּמִן־ <WH4480> from יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD יָס֥וּר <WH5493> departeth לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> and whose heart

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will be like כְּעַרְעָ֣ר <WH6176> A bush בָּֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> in the desert וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> without יִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> and shall not see כִּי־ <WH3588> when יָב֣וֹא <WH935> cometh ט֑וֹב <WH2896> when good וְשָׁכַ֤ן <WH7931> but shall inhabit חֲרֵרִים֙ <WH2788> the parched places בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> land מְלֵחָ֖ה <WH4420> [in] a salt וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> without תֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> and not inhabited ס

בָּר֣וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed הַגֶּ֔בֶר <WH1397> [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִבְטַ֖ח <WH982> that trusteth בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD מִבְטַחֽוֹ׃ <WH4009> and whose hope

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> will be like כְּעֵ֣ץ ׀ <WH6086> For he shall be as a tree שָׁת֣וּל <WH8362> planted עַל־ <WH5921> by מַ֗יִם <WH4325> by the waters וְעַל־ <WH5921> by יוּבַל֙ <WH3105> by the river יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> and [that] spreadeth out שָֽׁרָשָׁ֔יו <WH8328> her roots וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor [יִרָא כ] (יִרְאֶה֙ <WH3372> affright ק) כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יָבֹ֣א <WH935> cometh חֹ֔ם <WH2527> when heat וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become עָלֵ֖הוּ <WH5929> but her leaf רַֽעֲנָ֑ן <WH7488> shall be green וּבִשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> in the year בַּצֹּ֙רֶת֙ <WH1226> of drought לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִדְאָ֔ג <WH1672> and shall not be careful וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יָמִ֖ישׁ <WH4185> neither shall cease מֵעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> from yielding פֶּֽרִי׃ <WH6529> fruit

עָקֹ֥ב <WH6121> [is] deceitful הַלֵּ֛ב <WH3820> The heart מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all וְאָנֻ֣שׁ <WH605> above all [things] and desperately wicked ה֑וּא <WH1931> he מִ֖י <WH4310> Who יֵדָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3045> who can know

אֲנִ֧י <WH589> I יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> I the LORD חֹקֵ֥ר <WH2713> search לֵ֖ב <WH3820> the heart בֹּחֵ֣ן <WH974> [I] try כְּלָי֑וֹת <WH3629> the reins וְלָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> even to give לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> every man [כְּדַרְכֹּו כ] (כִּדְרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> along ק) כִּפְרִ֖י <WH6529> [and] according to the fruit מַעֲלָלָֽיו׃ <WH4611> of his doings ס

קֹרֵ֤א <WH7124> [As] the partridge דָגַר֙ <WH1716> sitteth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> has not יָלָ֔ד <WH3205> [on eggs] and hatcheth עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> [them] not [so] he that getteth עֹ֖שֶׁר <WH6239> riches וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> by בְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and not by right בַּחֲצִ֤י <WH2677> them in the midst [יֹמֹו כ] (יָמָיו֙ <WH3117> age ק) יַעַזְבֶ֔נּוּ <WH5800> shall leave וּבְאַחֲרִית֖וֹ <WH319> and at his end יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will be a נָבָֽל׃ <WH5036> shall be a fool
כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> throne כָב֔וֹד <WH3519> A glorious מָר֖וֹם <WH4791> high מֵֽרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> from the beginning מְק֖וֹם <WH4725> [is] the place מִקְדָּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <WH4720> of our sanctuary

מִקְוֵ֤ה <WH4723> the hope יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֹזְבֶ֖יךָ <WH5800> all that forsake יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> thee shall be ashamed [יִסֹורַי כ] (וְסוּרַי֙ <WH3249> they that depart ק) בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the earth יִכָּתֵ֔בוּ <WH3789> shall be written כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because עָזְב֛וּ <WH5800> because they have forsaken מְק֥וֹר <WH4726> the fountain מַֽיִם־ <WH4325> waters חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> of living אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

רְפָאֵ֤נִי <WH7495> Heal יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> me O LORD וְאֵ֣רָפֵ֔א <WH7495> and I shall be healed הוֹשִׁיעֵ֖נִי <WH3467> save וְאִוָּשֵׁ֑עָה <WH3467> me and I shall be saved כִּ֥י <WH3588> for תְהִלָּתִ֖י <WH8416> for thou [art] my praise אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Look הֵ֕מָּה <WH1992> like אֹמְרִ֖ים <WH559> Behold they say אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> Where דְבַר־ <WH1697> unto me Where [is] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Jehovah יָ֥בוֹא <WH935> abide נָֽא׃ <WH4994> now

וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> You לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor אַ֣צְתִּי ׀ <WH213> As for me I have not hastened מֵרֹעֶ֣ה <WH7462> from [being] a pastor אַחֲרֶ֗יךָ <WH310> to follow וְי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אָנ֛וּשׁ <WH605> the woeful לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor הִתְאַוֵּ֖יתִי <WH183> thee neither have I desired אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> Yourself יָדָ֑עְתָּ <WH3045> thou knowest מוֹצָ֣א <WH4161> that which came out שְׂפָתַ֔י <WH8193> of my lips נֹ֥כַח <WH5227> was [right] before פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thee הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> become אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּֽהְיֵה־ <WH1961> become
לִ֖י לִמְחִתָּ֑ה <WH4288> Be not a terror מַֽחֲסִי־ <WH4268> unto me thou [art] my hope אַ֖תָּה <WH859> in בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> of evil

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ <WH954> Let them be confounded רֹדְפַי֙ <WH7291> that persecute וְאַל־ <WH408> not אֵבֹ֣שָׁה <WH954> me but let not me be confounded אָ֔נִי <WH589> I יֵחַ֣תּוּ <WH2865> let them be dismayed הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like וְאַל־ <WH408> nay אֵחַ֖תָּה <WH2865> but let not me be dismayed אָ֑נִי <WH589> I הָבִ֤יא <WH935> bring עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> on י֣וֹם <WH3117> upon them the day רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> of evil וּמִשְׁנֶ֥ה <WH4932> them with double שִׁבָּר֖וֹן <WH7670> destruction שָׁבְרֵֽם׃ <WH7665> and destroy ס

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me הָלֹ֤ךְ <WH1980> unto me Go וְעָֽמַדְתָּ֙ <WH5975> and stand בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> in the gate בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children [עָם כ] (הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> folk ק) אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> come in בוֹ֙ מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> whereby the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which יֵ֣צְאוּ <WH3318> and by the which they go out ב֑וֹ וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> and in all the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And say אֲ֠לֵיהֶם <WH413> to שִׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> unto them Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> ye the word יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD מַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> ye kings יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and all Judah וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> that enter in בַּשְּׁעָרִ֥ים <WH8179> by these gates הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these ס

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִשָּׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> Take heed בְּנַפְשֽׁוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> to yourselves וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> and bear מַשָּׂא֙ <WH4853> no burden בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וַהֲבֵאתֶ֖ם <WH935> nor bring בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> [it] in by the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor תוֹצִ֨יאוּ <WH3318> Neither carry forth מַשָּׂ֤א <WH4853> a burden מִבָּֽתֵּיכֶם֙ <WH1004> out of your houses בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וְכָל־ <WH3605> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> ye any work לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַֽעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> neither do וְקִדַּשְׁתֶּם֙ <WH6942> but hallow אֶת־ <WH853> י֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> ye the sabbath כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I צִוִּ֖יתִי <WH6680> as I commanded אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> your fathers

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> But they obeyed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or הִטּ֖וּ <WH5186> not neither inclined אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנָ֑ם <WH241> their ear וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <WH7185> stiff אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְפָּ֔ם <WH6203> but made their neck לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> because [שֹׁומֵעַ כ] (שְׁמֹ֔ועַ <WH8085> listen ק) וּלְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> or קַ֥חַת <WH3947> nor receive מוּסָֽר׃ <WH4148> instruction

וְ֠הָיָה <WH1961> will come אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> And it shall come to pass if ye diligently תִּשְׁמְע֤וּן <WH8085> hearken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לְבִלְתִּ֣י ׀ <WH1115> no הָבִ֣יא <WH935> to bring מַשָּׂ֗א <WH4853> in no burden בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֛י <WH8179> through the gates הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> of this city הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> on the sabbath וּלְקַדֵּשׁ֙ <WH6942> but hallow אֶת־ <WH853> י֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> the sabbath לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> no עֲשֽׂוֹת־ <WH6213> to do [בֹּה כ] (בֹּ֖ו ק) כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> work

וּבָ֣אוּ <WH935> Then shall there enter בְשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> into the gates הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of this city הַזֹּ֡את <WH2063> likewise מְלָכִ֣ים ׀ <WH4428> kings וְשָׂרִ֡ים <WH8269> and princes יֹשְׁבִים֩ <WH3427> sitting עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֨א <WH3678> upon the throne דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> of David רֹכְבִ֣ים ׀ <WH7392> riding בָּרֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> in chariots וּבַסּוּסִ֗ים <WH5483> and on horses הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> they וְשָׂ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8269> they and their princes אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְיָשְׁבָ֥ה <WH3427> shall remain הָֽעִיר־ <WH5892> and this city הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

וּבָ֣אוּ <WH935> And they shall come מֵעָרֵֽי־ <WH5892> from the cities יְ֠הוּדָה <WH3063> of Judah וּמִסְּבִיב֨וֹת <WH5439> and from the places about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and from the land בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הַשְּׁפֵלָ֤ה <WH8219> and from the plain וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָר֙ <WH2022> and from the mountains וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> and from the south מְבִאִ֛ים <WH935> bringing עוֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> burnt offerings וְזֶ֖בַח <WH2077> and sacrifices וּמִנְחָ֣ה <WH4503> and meat offerings וּלְבוֹנָ֑ה <WH3828> and incense וּמְבִאֵ֥י <WH935> and bringing תוֹדָ֖ה <WH8426> sacrifices of praise בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
